          <title>
            <string language="en">Expansion of water upon freezing</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Expansion des Wassers nach dem Einfrieren</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expansion de l'eau lors de la congélation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Expansão da água em cima de congelar-se</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Espansione di acqua sul congelamento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επέκταση του ύδατος επάνω στο πάγωμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Extensión del agua sobre congelar</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that the ice molecules are farther apart that water molecules.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß die Eismoleküle 
auseinander daß Wassermoleküle weiter sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que les molécules de 
glace sont plus lointaines à part que des molécules d'eau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que as moléculas do 
gelo são mais distantes distante que moléculas de água.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che le molecole del 
ghiaccio sono più lontane a parte che molecole di acqua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι τα μόρια πάγου είναι 
μακρύτερα χώρια ότι μόρια ύδατος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que las moléculas del 
hielo son más lejanas aparte que las moléculas de agua.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
